title.rendered: Places for Nightlife in Agra – Club, Pubs & Market

content.rendered:
Agra, the city of love is not just famous for its incredible but is also famous for its happening nightlife. This land of the magnificent Taj Mahal, one of the seven wonders of the world, attracts thousands of tourists every year from all around the world. After the magical charm of witnessing the glory of the magnificent Taj Mahal flies away with the spectacular views of the sunset, the night comes with a new life.

By the time it gets dark, the city gets lighted with opening up several avenues to enjoy Agra’s exotic nightlife. There are some really amazing nightclubs in Agra where you can relish exotic cocktails, mouth-watering delicacies, and can enjoy a super relaxing time. The ambiance is quite soothing and comfortable, so what to wait, for now, pack your bags and be a part of the city nightlife by visiting the below-mentioned night places in the city.

Whenever we go outside we think of having great fun with friends residing in that particular city at night. This article is all about to inform you about the nightlife in Agra, the city of love. There are several things about nightlife in Agra that everyone doesn’t know like Nightclubs, Safe Places, Festivals, places to explore, and the best time to visit.

Nightclubs in Agra to Dance to the Groove

Club Rush

One of the most popular party places in the city, Club Rush is an ideal place for small celebrations and gatherings like birthdays, ladies night out, bachelor parties, etc. It is considered to be one of the most happening party places in the city assuring a memorable experience for every visitor. The nightclub has got a very dazzling and modernized interior décor with a grand dance floor and heart-thumping music.

This beautiful club has been established over a huge area having separate seating arrangements for couples, small groups as well as large groups. You get to find enough space for both outdoor as well as indoor seating arrangements. This colorful night place has its own brewery and exclusive accommodation to organize private parties. Additionally, the place offers several mouth-watering cuisines such as Italian, Mughlai, Chinese, Thai, etc.

If you are an alcohol addict then you can check out the huge list of Mocktails, wines, cocktails, beer shots, and other premium beverages, so select your favorite and order. The best thing is that it is a perfect place for those who love dancing as here the DJ plays all the latest club mixes, national as well as international chartbusters to let you enjoy the night away celebrating with your family and other trip companions.

Liquid Lounge Bar

One of the most happening sports Bars of the Tajganj area in Agra, Liquid Lounge Bar boasts a sporty ambiance equipped with varieties of board games, ultra-modern setting housing pool table. It also has a huge multi-screen where the live telecast of sports is organized.

An ideal site for sports freaks and indoor game lovers who seek to enjoy with their family, friends, and other travel companions along with eating and drinking. The contemporary style décor of the bar and the comfortable seating arrangements for almost every kind of lover makes it more charming.

The lounge offers you an exclusive selection of alcoholic beverages in the form of spirits, beers, cocktails, and in-house mocktails. They also serve the guests with plenty of lip-smacking cuisines such as Achari Paneer Tikka, Kebabs, Wasabi Prawns, Malaysian Chilly Chicken, etc. hence; it is a perfect place for late-night parties.

Color Bar

An admirable rooftop café in Agra in the Tajganj area in the Radisson Blue Hotel, Color Bar has got a vibrant ambiance and looks pretty captivating after it gets dark. The place is having hues of multiple colors and looks charming in the evening with a decorative open-air seating arrangement by the poolside. This is a restaurant cum café and bar offering lip-smacking delicacies with a proper romantic ambiance.

There are several known singers hosting live performances to light up the evening more for the travelers and the place boasts of an exclusive collection of continental cuisines like the Caribbean, Italian, Indian, Japanese, and Mexican. The bar serves you unique types of cocktails like Smoke Mary, Paan Petha Bhandar, Winerita, Pina Cilantro Cooler, and many more things.

The ultra-comfortable seating arrangement with the uptown ambiance of the poolside bar turns out the night into a unique experience. Enjoying the beats on the groovy music is one of the best ideas to enjoy a perfect nightlife.

The Bar – Tajganj

A must-visit destination in Agra in the Taj East Café Road, the Bar with a classy contemporary sophisticated decoration having grandly polished wooden furniture, beautiful windows, the glimmering chandeliers hanging above. The place serves as an epitome of glory to spend the night with your travel companion. Its strategic location allows travelers to have a mesmerizing night view of the grand Taj Mahal.

If you are a foodie and an alcohol addict then binge on your favorite beverages, drinks, and delectable delicacies. Check out the menu consisting of Martinis, American Whiskey, Oberoi signature, classic cocktails, tequilas, iced teas, and many more.

It is believed to be a happening place to go for unwinding relaxing in the silk upholstered sofas equipped with indoor entertainments like chess board along with enjoying the breathtaking sight of the gorgeous Taj Mahal.

Maikhana

A favorite lounge bar of the youngsters in Agra was established at ITC Mughal in Fatehabad road in the city. This fine dines Restro lounge is adorned with ultra-stylish furniture and alluring décor having captivating beauty and comfy seating arrangements with modern dazzling chandeliers hanging above to lit up the ambiance.

The place showcases a perfect blend of Indo-western architectures with courteous and experienced staff to ensure that you get all comforts. This luxurious relaxation hub is accompanied by delectable dinner cuisines, great music, and a huge section of whiskeys, cocktails, mocktails, sparkling wines, and other fine-brewed beverages to enjoy your nightlife with your friend’s gang. Sangria, Chicken Tikka, Chilli Paneer, Golden Fried Prawns, Margherita Pizza, etc. are some of the finest delicacies to taste.

Tapas

One of the most preferred nightclubs established at Jaypee Palace Hotel in Fatehabad Road, Tapas features sophisticated elegant interiors with a nicely arranged seating accommodation. There is plenty of entertaining live performances and events organized on regular basis in a lively ambiance. Those who are searching for an upbeat nightlife shall definitely visit Tapas Bar.

This famous night place in Agra serves you several meals ranging from lavish buffet lunch and dinner to mouth-watering snacks. North Indian, Chinese, and Continental cuisines are the specialties of this place and the bar also serves different kinds of beverages including wines, scotch, brandy, shooters, rums, vodkas, gins, cocktails, mocktails, and many other things.

Note- don’t forget to try out the signature items of this bar such as Alpina Papas, Fish Amritsari, Barbeque Chicken Wings, Cheese Nachos, and Spanish Veg Bullets.

Thor – The Party World

Established at Noor Enclave in the Shamshabad Link Road, Thor is an ultimate party destination and a complete entertainment zone for travelers having everything altogether including DJ nights to Karaoke nights, game zones, and that too with live sports screening. All party lovers can cherish the glory of this party place adorned with super luxurious interiors with laser lights and exciting music murals in the interior as well as exterior.

It is believed to have the best quality of sound systems and other equipment to make it look super pulsating. This bar is very much famous for hosting themed parties and Halloween nights and this place is tops in yummy food quality and a huge list of drinks and other beverages. In simple words, we can say that it is a perfect place for hardcore party lovers.

Glassy

One of the most astonishing bars in Agra to enjoy a perfect nightlife and gossip with your family and friends, Glassy features an urban interior décor with comfortable seating arrangements to enjoy the beverages while witnessing the architectural grandeur of Taj. A perfect place to visit if you are looking for a well-stocked bar having plenty of whiskeys, wines, and beers along with Chinese, Indian, and Continental delicacies.

Glassy offers you the best kind of comfy nightlife where you can enjoy dancing to the utmost level on groovy music and this makes it a great night out destination for the youngsters. The destination is best known for hosting several events like Vocal Jams, Theka nights, Dussehra nights, Valentine’s celebrations, and many other grand occasions.

These are some of the best places to enjoy the nightlife in Agra but the list doesn’t end here. We hope you found this article helpful and relatable, if yes, then do like, share, and comment on this post. Sharing this post with your family, relatives, and social media friends would be a great deed for us and we will appreciate your effort. Also, we would love to hear your feedback, thoughts, and suggestions with us in the comment box below.
